title: Best way to win in one-for-all.

replies.body: I counterpick with http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/877/200/b90.jpg
this game taste purple

> [{quoted}](name=H4nyuu,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=is2oojQc,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-10-26T12:08:57.037+0000)
>
> this game taste purple

That purple tasted squirrel.
cant counter pick in One for all its blind pick. also lulus laugh is adorable you blasphemous bastard

I did Lux one for all...
told everyone to laugh in Champ Select
...
got paired against Lux
needless to say we all threatened to laugh if we didn't stop laughing
Nunubot squad is a hard counter to Lux spam.

While funny (and fairly effective at POing the enemy) a true overpowered strat is against an AP focused team, who all built AP, is to just stack 5 banner of Commands.  Promote every minion in the wave that you can, and just roll with the now immune to magic damage minion wave ya got, while you all got roughly 60 MR (40 from self banner, 20 from one instance of an allied banner being applied).
I thought items with he same active all go on cooldown at the same time when one's active was used?

Stack one per person
each person promotes a different minion.
I didn't think of that. (obviously lol)
This is really OP, you can add baron in the mix later too and you can do the 1-3-1 with baron cannons that are immune to magic damage. also melee minions with 2.20 attack speed are hilarious.

5 {{champion:33}} spamming laugh.

...Wait.

Looks like it worked:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AvlW1Bc74Xw
lily more like Uh-  errr---------- LilBAD AYYYYYYEEEE COME ON AND SLAM AND WELCOME TO THE JAM
Dat binding chain... I can feel the suffering.

being unproductive is suffering......
(pls if you watch lily you gotta know this ;-;)
I discovered her recently and she makes me laugh a lot just by talking xD I might not have found out yet the struggle.
Ah I don't know do you like the art of animu??????????????
Counterpicked with 5 {{champion:20}} bot

5 {{champion:44}}' s spamming their jokes.


Gems for days.


They will win just by being truly truly outrageous.
Countered by definitely not 5 {{champion:53}}

*misses a grab*

*gets five lasers*

While a decent counter, you walk a fine line.
The point was the laugh spam because there's something about Definitely not Blitzcrank laughing that makes it more BM than normal. Not Nunu bot level but still
I'm not sure that even Nunu mains could take five Nunu bots.

Or simply just go Zac and leave the ultimates for impending team fights. 
http://i.imgur.com/jY6XYl1.png
GG
{{champion:81}} you belong in a museum
i think i would begin to slit my wrists

If I were {{champion:63}} I would just incinerate them.

I mean, come *on.* **you're made of fire.**
Yes, but when you're made of fire, you tend to get _heated_ easier and _flame_ a bit hard.

{{champion:74}} "DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DON-DONT WORRY"

"DONT WORRY YOU CAN LEARN SO MUCH FROM FAILURE"
{{champion:81}} Who needs a map?
Gragas counters lux, I'm not even kidding.
*picks nunubot* come at me
Whenever there's a Lux on the enemy team, I turn my voice volume all the way down immediately. End the suffering before it begins!

WHY DO I STILL HEAR IT?!
